issues.description: The Animal class's getName() and setName() methods are declared public in the solution, but the UML diagram and explicit instructions in the problem statement specify they should use protected visibility.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of getName() and setName() in Animal.java from public to protected to match the UML and instructions.

issues.description: The Animal constructor is declared public in the solution, but the UML diagram in the problem statement marks it as protected (# visibility).
issues.suggested_fix: Change the Animal(String) constructor in Animal.java from public to protected to align with the UML diagram.
